Service.MONTHLY SUPPLEMENT.-NOVEMBER 1917.NAVAL STAFF (Trade Division), ADMIRALTY,1st November 1.917.The following lists contain particulars of British Merchant and Fishing A^essela reported during October 1917 as having been captured, destroyed, damaged, or molested bythe Enemy.Vessels armed for offensive purposes are not included in these lists.
